item.title: How to make a code box
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

guttss man peeps wouldnt understand what ya wrote boy its ight i do here man

    public void helpMenu()
    {
    	clearQuestInterface();
        sendQuest("@dre@Help menu:", 8144); //Title
        sendQuest("@blu@How to level in BakaScape?", 8145);
        sendQuest("Attack anything in game such as mans,rats,goblins", 8147);
        sendQuest("@blu@How to level Hitpoints(HP)?", 8148);
        sendQuest("Some weapons have controlled mode which helps you", 8149);
        sendQuest("level health, if you have no weapon you have to go to", 8150);
        sendQuest("varrock and hit dummies", 8151);
        sendQuest("@blu@What does dummy do?", 8152);
        sendQuest("Dummies help you level health,smithing 20x faster", 8153);
        sendQuest("@whi@(ONLY IF YOUR ATTACK IS LOWER THAN 8)", 8154);
        sendQuest("@blu@How do I get food?", 8155);
        sendQuest("Fishing and cooking only way to get food and not to mention", 8156);
        sendQuest("you get 20 shrimps when you make a account", 8157);
        sendQuest("@blu@How do I get rare whips, robins, armours and weapons?" , 8158);
        sendQuest("Kill monsters for drops same as real runescape, otherwise" , 8159);
        sendQuest("if your thieving is high in the 80's you can theive nice", 8160);
        sendQuest("stuff at Ardougne", 8161);
        sendQuest("@blu@I gotta walk to wilderness?", 8162);
        sendQuest("No you can use the portal near Lumby castle exit, ", 8163); 
        sendQuest("but you get teleported to 50ish wilderness and users can click", 8164);
        sendQuest("portal to go back when they are about to die, so using varrock", 8165);
        sendQuest("wilderness better and safer on kills", 8166);
        sendQuestSomething(8143);
        showInterface(8134);
        flushOutStream();
    }

just do

   if(command.startsWith("commands")) {
        helpMenu();
      }

just change around the method if ya want

lol or just [ code ] gutts [ / code]
